content: 2nd single_crochet from hook fasten_off finishing cid 2 for the eyes use take 1 smaller and 1 larger button and put them facing each other cid 2 fold flap over and mark your eye placement with safety pins cid 2 unfold flap and stitch buttons on with some needle & thread now stuff your monster with a gift card credit cards money ipod nano or whatever else strikes your fancy ☺ comments find an error drop me an email amy at aahhh dot org ☺
